question: What are the names of projects that were completed before 2022? Return None if no answer is found.
sub_query_list: Check if any projects were completed before 2022
sub_answers: Projects completed before 2022 include Storm Drain Trash Screens and Dume Drive and Fernhill Drive Speed Humps Project.
Yes, the Storm Drain Trash Screens project and the Dume Drive and Fernhill Drive Speed Humps project were completed before 2022.
final_answer: The projects that were completed before 2022 are the Storm Drain Trash Screens project and the Dume Drive and Fernhill Drive Speed Humps project.

is anticipated that this phase of the project will be completed at the
end of February 2021.
